subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In the biggest upset of the men’s tournament thus far, Andy Roddick lost to Germany’s Philipp Kohlschreiber while 2006 women’s champion Amelie Mauresmo fell to Australian Casey Dellacqua.
snippet: In the biggest upset of the men’s tournament thus far, Andy Roddick lost to Germany’s Philipp Kohlschreiber while 2006 women’s champion Amelie Mauresmo fell to Australian Casey Dellacqua.
